profile.title: Who is Itya?
profile.text: In the summer of 2021, my grandpa bought me 'Animal Crossing: New Horizons'. My sister suggested giving myself a name that fit the game's vibe, so she tweaked my real name a bit and came up with 'Itya'. It doesn't mean anything special, but I really like it.

kosen.title: Our Beloved♥ Hakodate Kosen
kosen.text: President of the Hakodate Kosen Appreciation Club. I'm fighting daily to share the charm of our school. My current goal is to become besties with Principal Shimizu, then connect with his buddy Hajime Syacho, and finally collab with *his* buddy, Mr. Beast.

design.title: My Designs
design.text: Web, UI/UX, and Graphic Design. Lately, I've been into creating fictional railway maps. I also have some video editing skills, but my YouTube channel is famously rated as 'totally boring'.
